page.title: Home Depot Profit Rises on Services, Pros
page.text: ATLANTA (Reuters) - Home improvement retailing leader Home Depot Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HD.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HD.N</A> on Tuesday reported a 15 percent rise in third-quarter profit, topping estimates, aided by sales in its installed and professional businesses.
